                                                                                                                  1                                                                                                 Z  MACNormal               Johnson 9306538 This grant is to investigate the use of an amorphous silicon/ferroelectric liquid crystal optically addressed spatial light modulator (OASLM) (5) as essentially  real time film on which to record the fringe patterns and perform the Fourier transform via a coherent optical processor.  Since this device has a frame rate of ~3 kHz the PIV optical processor should be capable of 3 orders of magnitude speed increase over the best convential electronic processor. ***
